TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRemoteTypeContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

summary.span: 定義合約，元件可使用它來存取型別資訊，並且跨應用程式定義域和處理序界限叫用成員。

span.span: Defines a contract that components can use to access type information and invoke members across application domain and process boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得，可以呼叫元件物件的實作方法介面。To get an , components can call the method of an object that implements the interface. 若要取得的物件類型的相關資訊，請呼叫元件方法。To get information about the type of an object, components call the method. 若要取得物件的成員的相關資訊，元件會呼叫其中一個方法會傳回特定類型成員的相關資訊。To get information about the members of an object, components call one of the methods that returns information about a particular kind of member. 例如，若要取得事件的相關資訊的物件，元件可以使用或方法。For example, to get information about the events of an object, components can use the or method. 若要叫用物件的成員，請使用元件方法。To invoke a member of an object, components use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetCanonicalName() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回目前 的正式名稱。

span.span: Returns the canonical name of the current .
The canonical name of the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正式名稱是全域唯一的名稱，例如完整限定的類型名稱。The canonical name is a globally unique name, such as a fully qualified type name. 格式字串\<*組件名稱*>， \<*完整限定的類型名稱*> 建議使用的 managed 型別。Strings in the format \<*assembly name*>, \<*fully qualified type name*> are recommended for managed types. 格式字串\<*型別程式庫名稱*>， \<*型別名稱*> 建議使用適用於 COM 類型。Strings in the format \<*type library name*>, \<*type name*> are recommended for COM types. 發行類型之後，請勿變更類型的正式名稱。Do not change the canonical name for a type after the type is published. 變更的標準元件中斷相容性層級的元件和用戶端已經在使用型別之間的未來版本中的型別名稱。Changing the canonical name for a type in a future version of a component breaks compatibility between the component and clients that are already using the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準的名稱是全域唯一的名稱，例如 GUID。A canonical name is a globally unique name, such as a GUID. 格式字串\<*組件名稱*>， \<*完整限定的類型名稱*> 建議使用的 managed 型別。Strings in the format \<*assembly name*>, \<*fully qualified type name*> are recommended for managed types. 格式字串\<*型別程式庫名稱*>， \<*型別名稱*> 建議使用適用於 COM 類型。Strings in the format \<*type library name*>, \<*type name*> are recommended for COM types. 發行類型之後，請勿變更類型的正式名稱。Do not change the canonical name for a type after the type is published. 變更的標準元件中斷相容性層級的元件和用戶端已經在使用型別之間的未來版本中的型別名稱。Changing the canonical name for a type in a future version of a component breaks compatibility between the component and clients that are already using the type.

MemberSignature.Usage: iRemoteTypeContract.InvokeMember (name, bindingFlags, target, remoteArgs, remoteArgModifiers, localeId)

param.name: name
param.span: 要叫用之成員的名稱。

span.span: The name of the member to invoke.

param.name: bindingFlags
param.span: 值的位元組合，指定搜尋成員的方式。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that specifies how to search for the member.

param.name: target
param.span: 要叫用指定成員的 。

span.span: The on which to invoke the specified member.

param.name: remoteArgs
param.span: ，包含要傳遞給要叫用之成員的引數。

span.span: An that contains the arguments to pass to the member to invoke.

param.name: remoteArgModifiers
param.span: 布林值陣列，指出每個 remoteArgs 值是否以傳址方式傳遞。

span.span: An array of Boolean values that indicate whether each of the remoteArgs values is passed by reference.

param.name: localeId
param.span: 地區設定 ID，可用於所叫用之成員可能執行的地區設定特性轉換。

span.span: A locale ID to use for locale-specific conversions that might be performed by the member being invoked.

summary.span: 叫用目前 的指定成員。

span.span: Invokes the specified member of the current .
A that represents the return value of the invoked member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `remoteArgModifiers`參數僅用於寫入使用 COM 元件The `remoteArgModifiers` parameter is used only for components that are written using COM. 在每個值`remoteArgModifiers`參數會指出對應中是否有值`remoteArgs`參數傳址方式傳遞。Each value in the `remoteArgModifiers` parameter indicates whether the corresponding value in the `remoteArgs` parameter is passed by reference. 長度`remoteArgModifiers`應該是相同的長度`remoteArgs`。The length of `remoteArgModifiers` should be the same as the length of `remoteArgs`. 如果您傳遞`null`針對`remoteArgModifiers`，這個方法會使用預設邏輯來判斷是否用參考方式傳遞引數。If you pass `null` for `remoteArgModifiers`, this method uses default logic to determine whether an argument is passed by reference.
